title: The Secret Life of a Witch 3
description: There is an alternate cover edition for this ASIN here.My name is Evalee, and I used to think I was a witch. Turns out Iâ€™m not. Well, not a full witch anyway.  What I am is way worse than I ever could have imagined. And it makes me question who I can tell the truth to and who I can trust.  Volume 3 in the Mystic Willow Bay Witches Series
author: Jessica Sorensen
